channel.title: Multivariable Calculus on Loon
channel.description: Recent content in Multivariable Calculus on Loon

item.title: Search Function
item.description: Firstly, ensure you have these lines inside your config.toml file 1[outputs] 2 home = ["HTML", "RSS","JSON"] Compose implements Fuse js or Algolia to enable search functionality. By default Fuse is applied. Algolia can be enabled by adding this settings to config/_default/params.toml file 1# search 2[search] 3on = true 4global = false 5[search.algolia] 6enable = false # if false search will default to fusejs 7id = "Q40WQQX84U" # Application ID 8index = "compose" # Index name 9key = "da87401a458102ec6bbd6cc5e5cf8d95" # Search-Only API Key Both search engines will display results using the same UI.
